lead_paragraph: The Olympics will become a tangible reality on Friday, when one of its so-called "Mega" souvenir shops opens on Copacabana Beach.

headline.print_headline: Rio Olympics Becoming Reality; Bring Cash for Souvenirs
headline.main: Rio Olympics Becoming Reality; Bring Cash for Souvenirs
